title: Pathetic jellyfish
body:
Even if tons of facts show Garen and Taric are soulmate, people still force Garen and Katarin to be screen couple. Are you so jelous of 2 handsome and muscular men loving each other in the biblical way and only belong to each other? And they even beg Riot to say Garen and Taric are not offically romance couple, lmao, like rioter will just tell you in the face that the might of demacia is gay or something, where is their brain? 

And hence evertime I started a thread about Garen and Taric, there are full of jellyfish spamming saying they are not offical. IT SHOWS IN THE LORE HOW MUCH THEY LOVE EACH OTHER! YOU DON'T LET THEM BE WITH EACH OTHER AND YOU FORCE THEM TO BE WITH WOMEN TO AVOID BAIS! WHAT KIND OF JUSTICE IS THAT?!

I'm still amused how  a rioter just replied my random post and telling me Garen and Taric is not officially romance couple, like I opened a fobbiden door or something. :)

replies.body: Yeah, Garen loved Taric so much he personally sentenced him to climb Mount Targon expecting him to die.

"And while the Crown of Stone was traditionally used by the dishonored to simply flee Demacia and make a new life in exile, " 
Garen tries to protect Taric even when the later commited a felony. You clearly didn't read the lore.
That doesn't prove a thing. I'm not sure why you think it would.
That proves your opinion is wrong. Garen wants to save him not kill him.
How was sending him into exile going to save him as far as Garen was aware?
Because he commited a felony, which is supposed to be sentenced to death with no excuse.

You have privileges, not rights. No country will truly be on your side. Woke.
That's why I said so much for country of freemon of speech. Word.

It is not the playerbase forcing Garen and Katarina into a couple, Riot themselves hint about this romance frequently. 
You are allowed to have your own head canon, if you like Taric and Garen to be a couple, that's fine. But don't claim that it is canon, a Rioter directly told you that they are not.

And it's not like Riot has a problem with directly stating a champion as homosexual. Neeko is officially lesbian. The two hunters inside of Varus are a gay couple. So it is not like "Riot is trying to hide a forbidden secret here".

Those hints are in your mind. It never said they are romance in the lore. They are competitors, who honor each other in battle, as warrior and assasin, if not soul brother&sister's. 
However, it indicated in the lore Garen and Taric are beyond friends, if you ever read the new lore. They are the shield and the sword, like valmar&kai, they are bounded to be one. They hide the forbbiden love between Garen and Taric but more openly admit Valmar&Kai, because Garen's social status and background is too special, unlike Valmar/Kai, Garen is the might of Demacia, and his reputation can not be hindered by homosexual relationship like that.
